name: Școala de Aviație JETAV Flight Academy
about: Școala de Aviație JETAV Flight Academy, established in June 2016, is a premier aviation training institution in Romania. Our academy is staffed by experienced professionals in the field of aviation, ensuring high-quality training. We offer a range of programs, including pilot training, summer schools for children, and simulator experiences. Our summer school programs introduce young people to the world of aviation, with hands-on training and theoretical knowledge. We provide realistic simulator experiences, including a Boeing 737NG Simulator, and practical flying sessions at Strejnic Airport. Our goal is to nurture the next generation of aviation professionals and enthusiasts, making the world of flying accessible and exciting for all. At JETAV Flight Academy, we are dedicated to providing a comprehensive and engaging aviation education.
